title: PREMIUMBEAT.COM
overview:
This was our final project of the course, and definitely required the most amount of frames created. Here, we had a voiceover given to us and we needed to make visuals complement it. We could take it in any creative direction we chose. On my image of all my frames, I have listed out what phrases go with which images. We were given Premium Beatâ€™s brand PDF, in which we stuck to their color pallet and font requirements.

*created through School of Motion. For educational purposes only.
deliverables:
- The entire spot must be boarded out and must go along with the script
- The spot should end with the PremiumBeat logo and URL (premiumbeat.com)
descriptors:
- The demo is 18-65 M/F
- This spot will run online in various places such as YouTube pre-roll, Facebook video ads, Twitter ads...
- We are targeting content producers, Editors, Motion Designers, YouTubers, Podcasters, hobbyists...
- At the end of the spot we should direct folks to the url: premiumbeat.com
-Check out our site and brand guidelins (included) for examples of our brand voice and tone
- The Art Direction is totally up to you. We've provided footage and stills to use if you think they work, but a fully animated approach could work as well.
- The script is provided on page 2
